author: Reuters Editorial
title: Boeing proposed to Brazil government a deal excluding Embraer's defense business: source
text:
BRASILIA (Reuters) - Boeing proposed to the Brazilian government on Thursday night a deal excluding Embraerâ€™s defense business from a new vehicle for a partnership between the two planemakers, a Brazilian government source with knowledge of the talks told Reuters on Friday.
Another Brazilian government source earlier told Reuters that the latest proposal for a tie-up between Boeing ( BA.N ) and Embraer SA ( EMBR3.SA ) would include the creation of a third company.
Reporting by Ricardo Brito
